Title: Relates to funding the animal population control fund
Summary: Allocates funding for the New York city animal population control fund for the animal population control program; monies that emanate from any resident or source in NYC from certain violations and fees shall be allocated to the NYC animal population control fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง17-812, NYC Ad Cd; amd ยง404-p, V & T L; amd ยง97-xx, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the vehicle and traffic law and the state finance law, in relation to funding the animal population control fund
